name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms V with Power Up Kit
summary: Released in 1995, "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅴ with Power Up Kit" is the enhanced version of the 5th release in the Romance of the Three Kingdoms series. It places more focus on the common people with "Fame," which was an indicator of how well the Ruler grasped the hearts of the people. Fame influenced all of the Ruler's actions. For the battle phase, players enjoy strategy and the feel of battle in the Three Kingdoms using the formations and special skills assigned to each officer.
